name: tinted-lens

effect.scarlet_violet: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
effect.the_teal_mask: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
effect.the_indigo_disk: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

short_effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
